titleStmt.title: A letter sent from the Earle of Strafford to his lady in Ireland, a little before his death: May 11. 1641. Together vvith a speech of Mr. Plydell Esquire concerning the church; Feb. 8. 1641.
titleStmt.author: Strafford, Thomas Wentworth, Earl of, 1593-1641.
Pleydell, William, b. 1601 or 2.

notesStmt.note: "The speech of Master Plydell, Esquire" is identified as Thomason E.208[16].
Annotation on Thomason copy: "find it amongst the speeches".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
